description: Guà was the name in local dialect of the River Novo, alongside which the property is situated. Dine under the arcades of the barchessa in fine weather, soaking up the tranquil atmosphere of the park, and in the intimate, romantic dining room in winter, which boasts the same elegant style as the rest of the hotel. Enjoy refined reinterpretations of local specialities in the evening, and simpler fare at lunchtime.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
